TFT9_Gangplank_desc:
• Cutlass Passive: Gain 50 Armor and Magic Resist. Attacks ignite the target, dealing 240/360/4500 (%i:scaleAD%) true damage over 3 seconds.
  • Pistol Passive: Gain 3 range. Attacks grant 3 bonus mana.

    Active: Summon the Dreadway to sail across the board, crashing into the first enemy hit and dealing 450/675/9001 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage in a 3-hex radius. Allies the Dreadway passes through or hits with the crash are empowered by citrus, gaining 35/50/300% Attack Speed and immunity to crowd control for 3 seconds.
TFT9_Neeko_desc: Leap towards the current target and gain 225/350/475 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 3 seconds. Slam down after a brief delay, dealing 270/410/650 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within two hexes.
TFT9_Nautilus_desc:
Passive: Gain 30% bonus Armor and Magic Resistance from all sources.

Active: Deal 150/225/360 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within two hexes. Knock them up and pull them together, Stunning them for 1.5/1.5/2 seconds.
TFT9_Qiyana_desc: Dash to strike enemies in a line and deal <physicalDamage>180/270/424 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage, <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> and knocking up the first target hit for 1.5 seconds and all other targets for 0.5 seconds.
TFT9_Illaoi_desc: Deal <magicDamage>220/330/500 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target and link souls for 5 seconds. While linked, heal for <scaleHealth>25/30/40%</scaleHealth> of all damage taken by the target.
TFT9_Fiora_desc:
Become untargetable and strike the current target 4 times. Each strike deals 150/150/250 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and 60/90/270 (%i:scaleAP%) true damage. Heal for 20% of the total damage dealt.

If the target dies, change targets to the nearest enemy.
TFT9_Graves_desc:
Launch a smoke grenade at the current target. It explodes on impact, dealing 151/227/345 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to adjacent enemies, leaving behind a smoke cloud that Chills for 3/3.5/4 seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%
TFT9_Naafiri_desc:
Passive: Gain 15% (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp.

Active: Deal 87/140/223 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

Darkin Dagger: After casting, summon packmates that attack the first enemy hit for a total of 114/176/270 (%i:scaleAD%).

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt
TFT9_Silco_desc: Throw a vial at a nearby enemy, covering adjacent hexes in shimmer for <scaleLevel>6/6/10</scaleLevel> seconds. Enemies affected by shimmer take <magicDamage>80/120/425 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage per second. Allies affected by shimmer heal <scaleHealth>20/30/120 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health per second.
TFT9_Nilah_desc:
Passive: Attacks strike in a cone, dealing 75/75/100% (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to up to 2 additional enemies. Every 3rd attack strikes in a line for 170/175/375 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and grants 20/20/40% stacking Attack Speed.

Active: Gain 250/375/700 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 3 seconds and dash to a safe location.
TFT9_MissFortune_desc: Call down an X-shaped rain of bullets, destroying 35% of your target's shields and dealing <magicDamage>225/340/550 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. For 5 seconds, enemies hit have incoming shields reduced by 35%.
TFT9b_Aatrox_desc:
Transform for 12/12/30 seconds, converting 80% of bonus Attack Speed to Attack Damage. While transformed, attacks deal 220/330/4500 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage in an area.

Darkin Blade: Gain 350 Health and 15% (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp. If another unit holds this weapon for at least 4 seconds, Aatrox will revive upon their death.

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt
TFT9_Milio_desc: Kick a ball at the current target that deals <magicDamage>190/285/425 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and <TFTKeyword>Stuns</TFTKeyword> for 1.5 seconds. The ball bounces to the closest enemy behind the target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamageAOE@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage on impact and <magicDamage>85/125/190 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
TFT9_TwistedFate_desc: Throw a hand of cards at the current target that deal <magicDamage>165/250/375 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. After 1.5 seconds the cards explode, dealing <magicDamage>210/315/490 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to nearby enemies.
TFT9_Mordekaiser_desc:
Passive: Attacks deal 100/150/375 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage, increased to 250/375/900 (%i:scaleAP%) while God of Death is active.

Active: Gain 400/720/1296 (%i:scaleHealth%) Shield and 1 range for 5 seconds. Killing enemies in this state steals 6/6/15% of their Health, Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resistance until combat ends.
TFT9_RyzeShadowIsles_desc:
Mark the 1/1/10 ally's soul(s) with the lowest current health to be reclaimed by the Shadow Isles. After they die, they return to the battlefield with 40/80/3% (%i:scaleAP%) of their maximum Health.

If all living allies are already marked, Ryze instead resurrects a deceased ally.

Ryze cannot resurrect himself.
TFT9_BelVeth_desc: Lash out at the lowest Health enemy in range <TFTBonus>6/6/30 (%i:scaleAS%)</TFTBonus> times. Each lash deals <physicalDamage>74/114/226 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage and <trueDamage>2%</trueDamage> of the target's max Health as true damage.
TFT9_BelVeth_details_1: Total Number of Lashes: <TFTBonus>6</TFTBonus> = <scaleLevel>6</scaleLevel> + 5 per 100%  bonus %i:scaleAS%
TFT9_Jhin_desc:
Take aim at the current target and deal 462/693/1039 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies in a line; each hit reduces damage by 40%.

Ionia Bonus: +25% Attack Damage
TFT9_Poppy_desc: Gain <TFTBonus>250/325/400/350 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for 4 seconds. Deal <magicDamage>140/210/315/315 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target.
TFT9_Katarina_desc:
Throw three daggers that land next to enemies within 2 (%i:scaleRange%) hexes. Then, teleport to each and deal 145/220/350 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies and Wound them for 6 seconds.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%
TFT9_Karma_desc:
Fire a burst of energy that explodes upon impact, dealing 170/255/420 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies. Every third cast launches 3 bursts.

Ionia Bonus: +20 Ability Power
TFT9_KSante_desc:
Heal for 100/180/324 (%i:scaleHealth%), then knock up the current target before smashing them to the edge of the battlefield. Deal 250/400/1000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Stun them for 2/2.5/10 seconds. Deal 250/400/1000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies the target collides with and Stun them for 1/1.25/5 seconds.

If the target can't be pushed back any further, knock them off the battlefield. Otherwise, chase after them.
TFT9_Nasus_desc:
Steal 5/5/15% maximum Health, 8% Attack Damage, 4/4/20 Armor, and 4/4/20 Magic Resist from the nearest 4/5/7 enemies for 8 (%i:scaleAP%) seconds.

While empowered, every third attack deals 228/342/945 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.
TFT9_ChoGath_desc: Deal <magicDamage>375/559/840 (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the lowest Health enemy in range. If this kills them, devour them and permanently gain <scaleHealth>30/35/40</scaleHealth> maximum Health.
TFT9_Orianna_desc: Grant the lowest Health ally <TFTBonus>225/250/325 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for 4 seconds and empowers Orianna's next attack to deal <magicDamage>260/390/585 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage.
TFT9_Sona_desc: Send a wave of sound at the largest clump of enemies and deal <magicDamage>105/155/255 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies hit. Allies hit by the wave gain <TFTBonus>35/40/45%</TFTBonus> Attack Speed for 5 seconds.
TFT9_Shen_desc:
Gain 350/450/2000 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield and grant 225/275/1500 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield to the 2 lowest-Health allies for 4 seconds. After shielding his allies, Shen's Shield refreshes with a burst, dealing 240/360/2500 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies.

Ionia Bonus: +8% Damage Reduction
TFT9_Soraka_desc:
Heal the lowest health ally for 170/190/220 (%i:scaleAP%). If the ally is below 50% Health, heal them for an additional 56/63/73 (%i:scaleAP%).

Over the next 5 seconds, 5 stars hit the enemy closest to them. Each deals 115/165/260 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
TFT9_RyzeShurima_desc:
Create a portal to Shurima, summoning a roaming sand tornado that deals 175/275/2500 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies hit and knocks them up, Stunning them for 1/1.25/3 second(s).

The tornado has a chance to unearth buried treasures and gold as it travels.
TFT9_Malzahar_desc: Open two portals near the current target. Destroy 50% of Shields and deal <magicDamage>220/330/500 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to all enemies caught between the portals.
TFT9_Aphelios_desc:
Fire a moon blast at the largest group of enemies that deals 144/216/1013 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

For 7 seconds, equip 3 Chakram, plus 1 more for each enemy hit by the blast. Attacks deal 3.6/5.4/20 (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage for each Chakram equipped. Aphelios heals for 75% (%i:scaleAP%) of damage dealt by Chakrams.
TFT9_RyzeZaun_desc:
Create 5/8/25 portals to Zaun, causing hired guns to fire at nearby enemies. Deals 125/230/2006 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Wounds, 20% Shreds, and 20% Sunders for 6 seconds. The more gold you have, the more powerful the portals become.

25 Gold: +1 portal. Portals fire a rocket that deals 50% damage in a one-hex radius.
50 Gold: Double the portals. Summon 1 additional portals for every 20 Gold more.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 50%
Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor
TFT9_RyzeIxtal_desc:
Create a portal to Ixtal, coating the ground around the current target in a thicket of vines. After a brief delay, deal 370/570/3000 (%i:scaleArmor% %i:scaleMR%) magic damage to enemies within and Stun enemies at the epicenter for 2/2/10 seconds with a knockup.

Allies within are wrapped in Barkskin, granting 100 (%i:scaleArmor%) Armor and 100 (%i:scaleMR%) Magic Resistance for 4 (%i:scaleAP%) seconds.
TFT9_Cassiopeia_desc:
Deal 170/255/385 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target and Wound them for 5 seconds. If they are already Wounded, deal 51/77/116 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%
TFT9_RyzePiltover_desc: Create a portal to Piltover that launches an enforcer grenade towards the largest clump of enemies, dealing <magicDamage>275/425/3000 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within two hexes and creating a containment area for <scaleLevel>3/4/8</scaleLevel> seconds. Enemies are unable to leave the area, and <scaleLevel>15/30/500%</scaleLevel> of the damage dealt to them is also dealt to all other enemies within.
TFT9_RyzeBilgewater_desc:
Create a portal to Bilgewater, summoning a giant treasure chest to fall on the largest cluster of enemies that deals 350/525/7777 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. The size of this chest is increased by 1% for every 2 gold you have.

Each enemy hit has a chance to knock gold or other treasures out of the chest, and that chance doubles if the chest kills the enemy.
TFT9_Ekko_desc: Heal <scaleHealth>20%</scaleHealth> of damage taken in the last 4 seconds and deal <magicDamage>270/405/610 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target.
TFT9_Jinx_desc: Fire 5 rockets at random enemies within 2 hexes of the current target. Each rocket deals <physicalDamage>98/148/233 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.
TFT9_JarvanIV_desc: Leap on a nearby enemy. Deal <magicDamage>140/210/800 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes and <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> them for <scaleLevel>1.75/2.25/8</scaleLevel> seconds.
TFT9_Ryze_desc:
Create a portal to Bandle City under the most expensive unit on your bench. They are summoned to the battlefield with @ModifiedBonusMana@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus Mana and are...slightly smaller?

If there are no units left on your bench, Ryze summons a random high tier unit instead.
TFT9_Ashe_desc:
Fire 8 arrows in a cone, each dealing 88/136/217 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the first enemy hit and Chilling them for 2 (%i:scaleAP%) seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%
TFT9_Ahri_desc:
Steal essence from enemies around the current target, dealing 90/135/1000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and 20% Mana Reaving them.

Every 3/3/1 casts, unleash a wave that deals 230/350/1888 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all enemies hit. This deals 33% more damage to enemies whose essence has been stolen.

Ionia Bonus: +3 Mana per second

Mana Reave: Increase max Mana until the next cast
TFT9_RyzeBandleCity_desc:
Create a portal to Bandle City under the most expensive unit on your bench. They are summoned to the battlefield with 25/70/200 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus Mana and are...slightly smaller?

If there are no units left on your bench, Ryze summons a random high tier unit instead.
TFT9_Swain_desc:
Transform and gain 325/375/550 (%i:scaleAP%) max Health. While transformed, deal 25/40/60 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes every second.

If already transformed, gain an additional 225/260/385 (%i:scaleAP%) max Health and deal 100/160/300 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within.
TFT9_Azir_desc:
Passive: Every third attack, a Sand Soldier deals 100/150/500 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to their target.

Active: Summon a Sand Soldier to attack your target. If Azir already has 3 Soldiers, they all immediately deal 70/105/350 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage instead.
TFT9_Kassadin_desc:
Gain 250/300/400 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds. Deal 135/200/300 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies in a cone and Disarm them for 1.5/1.75/2 seconds.

Disarm: Cannot move or attack, but CAN cast spells
TFT9_RyzeFreljord_desc:
Create a portal to the Freljord under a random group of enemies for 2 seconds. The freezing winds deal 300/450/3500 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within two hexes over the duration and apply Permafrost, a permanent Chill.

If enemies are already affected by Permafrost, they are instead Stunned for the duration.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%
TFT9_Darius_desc: Deal <physicalDamage>235/350/515 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the current target. If they die, immediately cast this again with <scaleLevel>82/85/90%</scaleLevel> damage.
TFT9_Xayah_desc:
Summon 7/7/12 feathers that converge on and pierce the current target, dealing 67/103/177 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage. Each feather removes 6 Armor from the first target they hit until the end of combat.

Ionia Bonus: Attacks restore an additional %i:scaleMana% 5 Mana
TFT9_Jayce_desc: Grant <TFTBonus>30/40/50% (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Attack Speed to Jayce and <TFTBonus>15% (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> to the allies on his left and right for 3 seconds. Fire a blast at the current target that explodes on the first enemy hit. It deals <physicalDamage>179/268/431 (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies near the blast.
TFT9_Warwick_desc:
Passive: Attacks heal for 30/35/40 (%i:scaleAP%).

Active: Gain 100% Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. Then, Stun adjacent enemies for 1.25/1.5/2 seconds.
TFT9_VelKoz_desc: Fire a plasma bolt towards the current target that deals <magicDamage>250/375/600 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the first enemy hit. It then splits in two, dealing 50% less damage whenever it passes through an enemy.
TFT9_Vi_desc:
Gain 350/400/450 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds. Deal 150/225/338 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within 1 hex of the current target and 20% Sunder them for 4 seconds.

Sunder: Reduce Armor
TFT9_Renekton_desc: Deal <magicDamage>180/270/400 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies. Heal <scaleHealth>220/270/320 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> for the first enemy hit and another <scaleHealth>30 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> for each additional one.
TFT9_RekSai_desc:
Deal 174/261/405 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target. If they are below 66% Health, deal true damage instead.

If this kills the target, rip through them 1 hex and heal for 80/144/259 (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%).
TFT9_Taliyah_desc:
Passive: Whenever an enemy is knocked up or back by anything, throw a boulder towards them. It deals 110/160/240 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the first enemy hit.

Active: Deal 180/270/410 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target and knock them up, Stunning them for 2 seconds.
TFT9_Galio_desc: Reduce damage taken by 25/25/35% and heal for <scaleHealth>300/350/400 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> over 2.5 seconds. After, deal <magicDamage>200/300/450 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
TFT9_Sett_desc:
Grab an enemy from either side and slam them together, knocking them up. Deals 180/270/420 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Stuns them for 1.25/1.5/2 seconds.

If only one enemy is grabbed, the damage and Stun duration are increased by 50%.

Ionia Bonus: +200 max Health
TFT9_KaiSa_desc: Dash away from all enemies, then fire <scaleLevel>15/15/25</scaleLevel> missiles split across the 4 nearest enemies. Each missile deals <magicDamage>75/111/240 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
TFT9_Samira_desc: Shoot at the current target and deal <physicalDamage>95/143/225 (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit. Reduce their Armor by <TFTBonus>10/15/20 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> for the rest of combat.
TFT9_THex_desc:
T-Hex is still powering up and has no Ability. Once she reaches @PowerRequirement@ Power, gain Hextech Breath.

Hextech Breath: Unleash a huge laser dealing magic damage.
TFT9_Irelia_desc:
Enter a defensive stance and gain 350/400/450 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield that rapidly decays over 3 seconds. When it expires, deal 70/100/150 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage + 30% of the damage absorbed to enemies around and in front of Irelia.

Ionia Bonus: +25 Armor and Magic Resist
TFT9_VoidRemora_desc: Gain <TFTBonus>200 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for 2 seconds. When it expires, deal <magicDamage>125 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
TFT9_Taric_desc: Gain <TFTBonus>500/580/680 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for 4 seconds. It redirects 50% of the damage received by adjacent allies.
TFT9_Sejuani_desc:
Passive: Whenever an ally attacks a Chilled enemy, they deal 17/30/356 (%i:scaleHealth%) bonus true damage.

Active: Gain 600/700/2000 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds. Deal 160/240/1200 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to nearby enemies and Chill them for 4 seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%
TFT9_HeimerdingerTurret_desc: Fire a laser beam at the current target. Deal <magicDamage>185/275/4000 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies it passes through.
TFT9_RiftHerald_desc: Charge toward the furthest enemy and crash into the first enemy hit. Deal <magicDamage>240 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies adjacent to the impact and Stun them for 2 seconds.
TFT9_BaronNashor_desc:
Passive: Cast every 2 attacks and cycle between 3 different Abilities: this, Voracious Bite (damage an enemy and heal), and Void Tentacle (damage and Stun a group).

Active: Lob three pools of acid towards the largest group of enemies, dealing 175 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and 40% Shredding and Sundering for 4 seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor
TFT9_RyzeTargon_desc:
Create a portal to the skies above Mount Targon that beckons the current target. After a few seconds, they descend from the heavens as a meteor towards the largest group of enemies, dealing 18/30/100% (%i:scaleAP%) of the initial target's maximum Health as magic damage. Enemies in the epicenter are briefly knocked up.

If the target is the only enemy remaining, they never descend.
TFT9_Heimerdinger_desc: Hurl a grenade towards the largest group of enemies, dealing <magicDamage>150/225/3141 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies in a large area and <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> them for <scaleLevel>1.5/2/15</scaleLevel> seconds.
TFT9_RyzeNoxus_desc:
Create a portal to Noxus that spews out a torrent of weapons and armor, granting 3/4/10 completed items to random allies with open slots, and throwing 4/5/12 axes towards random enemies that deal 150/225/2000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage each.

If an ally would recieve an item while all slots are full, they instead gain a stacking 10% damage increase for the rest of combat.
TFT9_Quinn_desc: Launch Valor through the row or column with the most enemies, marking them to take <TFTBonus>10% (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> increased damage for 4 seconds. Then rain down arrows, dealing <physicalDamage>330/500/763 (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage split between all marked enemies.
TFT9_Kayle_desc:
Passive: Gains new Passive effects as your Tactician levels up.
Level 1: Attacks deal 30/45/70 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.
Level 6: Every 3rd attack launches a wave that deals 30/40/60 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and 20% Shreds enemies for 3 seconds.
Level 9: Every attack launches a wave and they travel farther.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
TFT9_Sion_desc:
Passive: Upon death, reanimate with 100% Health, decaying at 20/13/0% maximum Health per second. Sion can no longer use his Ability, but is immune to crowd control and gains
150/150/1000% (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed.

Active: Charge towards the most enemies within 4 (%i:scaleRange%) hexes. Deal 158/247/788 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to any enemies along the way and knock them up, Stunning them for 1.25/1.5/15 seconds.
TFT9_RyzeDemacia_desc:
Create a portal to Demacia that protects allies for 2/2/5 seconds. Allies within the zone gain 600/900/9999 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield. If an ally leaves the safety of the portal, they are healed for 250/375/9999 (%i:scaleAP%).

When the portal expires, enemies within are dealt 300/450/999 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
TFT9_RyzeIonia_desc: Create a portal to Ionia in the center of the battlefield, summoning forth a Spirit Tree that affects the <scaleLevel>5/7/20</scaleLevel> closest units. Allies gain <TFTBonus>30/40/300%</TFTBonus> Attack Speed for 6 seconds and are healed for <scaleHealth>400/500/3000 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> over the duration. Enemies dance, dealing <magicDamage>175/275/1500 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and Stunning them for <scaleLevel>2/2.5/20</scaleLevel> seconds.
